segments.text: What are you studying all day long for ? It ’ s summer vacation !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know ! I hate it ! But I ’ m taking this crash course in math .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have to take my exams for getting into the university , so I need to prepare .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think it will help ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It has to ! I ’ Ve been studying every day , eight hours a day ! I don ’ t know , but the school has a great success record .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hmm ... Maybe I should sign up too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll pick up an application form for you at school tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2
